divs: Sighting DetailsThree of us were sitting on the porch talking and enjoying the Perseid showers when we noticed over the course of an hour three separate objects fly from the north to the south that seemed like a satellite at first but then would flash rythmically and become extremely bright. I would estimate as bright as a candlelight at arm's length. One by one they went over us. I tried to dismiss them as satellites or high flying aircraft but I have never seen the intensity of illumination or rhythmic patterns they possessed. They also moved slowly and even seemed to stop at times while pulsating. I was truly dumbfounded.
Summary: Three flashing objects went from north to south
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around August 13th 2009
